name: Peace and Conflict Studies Independent Study Course
description: This course is designed to provide students with the opportunity to explore topics not covered in the curriculum, or to develop a more detailed focus on topics covered. Approval of the program director is required. The student must obtain written agreement of the instructor who will supervise the independent study, submit the proposal to and obtain approval from the director and program administrator, who will then add the student to the course. Not eligible for CR/NCR option.  Applications are due two weeks before course enrollment deadlines for each semester.
department: Munk School of Global Affairs and Public Policy
